title: United Mediocrity Gaming Community

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
'Have you ever been looking for a place to play a few games of league of legends with the added benefit of voice chat? Well now there is a place for that and much more! Many of our members frequently play league and dread having to play with people they don't have proper communication with. 

In addition to just a general community we plan on hosting in house tournaments, giveaways and various other ways to show the community is appreciated.Other than league many of our members play games such as Minecraft, Starcraft 2 etc. We also host various game servers and willing to expand even further if the community want is high enough.
